mapper.insert: insert into systime_querytimeset (compid, query_name, query_time, query_start_time, query_stop_time, recstatus, updownmark, updown) VALUES ( #{compid},#{queryName},#{queryTime},#{queryStartTime},#{queryStopTime},#{recstatus},#{updownmark},#{updown} )
mapper.delete: delete from systime_querytimeset where compid=#{compid} and query_name =#{queryName}
mapper.select: select * from systime_querytimeset where compid =#{compid} and recstatus =0
